tables.name: Fact_Pakket

tables.name: Fact_Polis

[MutatieredenPolis_Id], [Status] AS [Status], CAST([Termijn] AS int) AS [Termijn], CAST([Looptijd] AS int) AS [Looptijd], CAST([Ingangs_Datum] AS date) AS [Ingangs_Datum], CAST([PremieVerval_Datum] AS date) AS [PremieVerval_Datum], CAST([ContractVerval_Datum] AS date) AS [ContractVerval_Datum], CAST([Wijzigings_Datum] AS date) AS [Wijzigings_Datum], CAST([Expiratie_Datum] AS date) AS decimal(15,2)) AS [IncassoProvisie_Jaar], CAST([AfsluitProvisie_Jaar] AS decimal(18,2)) AS [AfsluitProvisie_Jaar], CAST([BonusProvisie_Jaar] AS decimal(15,2)) AS [BonusProvisie_Jaar], CAST([AgentProvisie_Jaar] AS decimal(15,2)) AS [AgentProvisie_Jaar], CAST([Kosten] AS decimal(18,2)) AS [Kosten], CAST([Is_PakketPolis] AS bit) AS [Is_PakketPolis], CAST([Is_OpenstaandeAgendaAanwezig]
